meanings: (손으로 쥐다) hold (sth in one's hand), take, (꽉) grasp, grip, (literary) clasp, (갑작스레) grab, seize

vlive.korean: 제가 잡으려다 다치면 어떡해? and hurt her while I try to grab it? 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 여자친구 하이텐션🙌🤸🤹🎤
vlive.english: and hurt her while I try to grab it?

vlive.korean: 이걸 잡으려다 보니까 안무를 놓쳤는데 이게 방송에 나갔더라고요. so I missed the dance move trying to catch it, and it went out on air. 듣기 View video PeekaVoo! : VICTON 빅톤 Welcome to VICTON house! 우리집에 놀러 와!
vlive.english: so I missed the dance move trying to catch it, and it went out on air.

vlive.korean: 자리 잡아! Get into position! 듣기 View video ASTRO : 초콜릿스트로🍫
잡으면... 앗 뜨거! If I hold it... It's hot! 듣기 View video ASTRO : 따나의 얼렁뚱땅 초코츄러스 만들기🐥🍫
vlive.english: If I hold it... It's hot!
